name: Smaller Battle
description:
Made In 24 hours for The Saturday Jam hosted by TacoSauceDev and CybearTron
You Got Into A fight with a monster On A Beach, and you must win. But Wait, You Have A Weakness, You Get smaller and weaker in each move.
Fight With Honor And Win Valor.

Honestly, Its a small game but i still want this to be better than last time,
Please Rate it... UwU.

Tutorial For Yall :
No Controls
Left Click On A Card To Play It.
Use The Right Cards To Defeat the Enemy

Win.

Your Weird Dev,
Lostybtw
